prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or fractal-spiraling appendages with infinite recursive patterns incorporating fractal, merkaba, flower_of_life patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, elaborate with shifting Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and merkaba emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade with primordial spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor ZIRZIRD's profile: 'He who was and will be', Aethyr MAZ, Fire element, Tarot Death, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Scorpio, embodying the essence: 'In ZIRZIRD's presence, the cosmic ledger turns epochs are tallied on starry wheels with unwavering p...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth
visual_elements.hair_style: fractal-spiraling appendages with infinite recursive patterns

outfit.magical_essence: flickering flame wisps and ember particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who was and will be'
profile_data.essence: In ZIRZIRD's presence, the cosmic ledger turns epochs are tallied on starry wheels with unwavering precision.
profile_data.angelic_role: Angel of Eternal Cycle; guides solar warriors.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-dimensional prismatic form resembling an obsidian flame-crystal, reflecting the transformative fire of Geburah and the razor-sharp discernment of Scorpio's penetrating essence
profile_data.color_reasoning: Black represents the void of potential, crimson embodies the transformative fire of divine will; shifting pattern reflects the eternal cycle of destruction and rebirth
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries represent cosmic intelligence and transformative energy cycles, embodying the non-linear nature of time and consciousness
